channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for AK
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for AK

item.title: Report X-2024120623
item.description:
Report X-2024120623

Identified by scraper @ 2024-12-13T15:15:09+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-12-04
  • City: ANCHORAGE
  • State: AK
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Air
  • Carrier/Reporter: FEDERAL EXPRESS CORPORATION
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: On December 4th a package that was sent by a beauty supply shop was discovered during the AM sort by having a slight odor. Further investigation showed that the package contained beauty supplies including three aerosol cans, UN1950 Aerosols, flammable, 2.1. The contents did not spill, and were placed in the DG Hold area pending further investigation.
